gameManager

Interface RobotObserver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameManager

    public interface RobotObserver
    Robot observer is create in order to to be able to have interaction between game manager and Robot

        Get the number of Robots visible to Unit 'u'.

        Returns:

                int dir,
                Unit unit)

        dir - The direction of the target tile
        unit - The Unit attempting to shoot.

      • forthCheck

        java.lang.String forthCheck(Unit unit,
                            int checkDirection)
        Check the contents of the tile in direction 'checkDirection' from Unit 'unit'.
        Parameters:
        unit - The Unit checking
        checkDirection - The direction to check in.
        Returns:
        Details concerning the contents of the tile checked.

      • sendMessage

        boolean sendMessage(ForthString destType,
                    Value payLoad)
        Send a message consisting of of the Value 'payload' from the current Unit to the current Unit's teamate of type destType.
        Parameters:
        destType - The type of the Unit this message is destined for.
        payLoad - The contents of the message.
        Returns:
        true if the send was successful, false otherwise.
